client.model.interfaces

Class IHex

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.interfaces.IHex
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hex

    public abstract class IHex
extends java.lang.Object
    The iHex class is the abstract interface represents a hex on the map.
